This is great except for the fact of the "AI Disabled" that seems to happen a few saves into the game. This is an anti-piracy thing that was apparently put in, but this torrent does not include a patch for it!

I'm just blown away by how easy this game was to get working... it involves 2 steps. 

1.) Unzip RAR

2.) click launcher and play

You don't even have to install. AMAZINGLY good work pctorrent, props for putting together and unbelievably easy version of what seems to be the most difficult to crack game around. Very VERY good download.
